title: prarabda miTTuNDaga
sahitya:
prArabdha miTTuNDga norula nana pani lEdu nIvuNDaga

anupallavi

 bAla guNashIla janapAla varada krpAlavla kAlAtIta shUlAdhara vinuta nA

caraNam

 upAkari nE naitE nApakAru layyEdaru krpa jUcitE migula nEpamu lencEdarayya 
capala cittalu bhakta vEsulai nanu jUci shAstru layyEdaru shrI tyAgarAjApta nA
